#summary Information about the Visualisation Service

= !AusStage Visualisation Service = 

The Visualisation Service is designed to display the statistical information on AusStage data in variant charts.

The way of retrieving data is by using the chart API. Then [http://mbostock.github.com/d3/ d3.js] is used to create charts.

<h1> Chart API </h1>

The Chart API provide the functionality to retrieve data for a given task. The details of the API are as follows:

== Base URL ==

The base URL for the Chart API is as follows:

http://beta.ausstage.edu.au/visualisation/chart?

Combining this URL with the parameters outlines below retrieves data from AusStage database and RDF datastore.

== Available Parameters ==

|| *Name* || *Possible Values* || *Optional* || *Default* ||
|| [NavigatingNetworksDatasetAPIlookup#task task]   || key-collaborators, system-property, collaborator, collaboration || No || ||
|| [NavigatingNetworksDatasetAPIlookup#id id]     || Unique contributor id / system property id || No || ||
|| [NavigatingNetworksDatasetAPIlookup#format format] || html xml json || Yes || html ||
|| [NavigatingNetworksDatasetAPIlookup#sort sort]   || count id name || Yes || count || 
|| [NavigatingNetworksDatasetAPIlookup#callback callback] || function name to use for a JSONP request || Yes || ||
